item.title: MTurk payments
item.description: If you’ve come to this page, you’ve probably participated in one of the MTurk HITs conducted by Benjamin Beranek and Geoffrey Castillo. As detailed in the instructions, please find below the records of the relevant decisions and MTurk transaction histories. item.title: Resources for the young economist
item.description: Below are some resources that I found helpful when starting in academia.
